Mendokusai

Tartarus

5am

15 Jan 2019

I am writing this at 5:15am, and have to leave in 30 minutes to catch a flight, so it is going to be quick.

Today I get to go floating, see one of my favourite bands live and stay with one of my oldest friends. It has the potential to be an amazing day, and I am very excited. Without getting my hopes up too much, I think I'm going to be really happy.

I'm sure I'll tell you all about it tomorrow.
